## getRenderInfo() function

Get GPU information. See also [WEBGL\_debug\_renderer\_info](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WEBGL_debug_renderer_info)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getRenderInfo(): {
    vendor: string;
    renderer: string;
} | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

{ vendor: string; renderer: string; } \| undefined
